chapter.title: Before You Install
chapter.para: This chapter covers software and hardware prerequisites for installing and running OpenIG software. If you have a special request to support a component or combination not listed here, contact ForgeRock at info@forgerock.com.

section.title: Which OpenIG to Use
section.para: There are two versions of the Open Identity Gateway, OpenIG and OpenIG (Federation). The OpenIG Federation consists of OpenIG plus additional Federation libraries. Unless you require Federation capabilities, use core OpenIG.

section.title: JDK Version
section.para: Download and install Sun Java SE JDK 6 Update 21 or later. At this time these are the only versions of any JDK supported with OpenIG.

section.title: Web Application Container
section.para: See the chapter on Configuring Deployment Containers in the Guide to OpenIG for details on setting up your web application container.
